code: import React from'react';import babaji from'./Images/babaji.jpeg';import maam from'./Images/maam.jpeg';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Article(){const articleContent=[{imgSrc:babaji,name:"Dr. Rahul (Babaji)",title:"BHMS Banaras",description:"Step into the world of holistic healing guided by Dr. Rahul, a seasoned homeopathic physician and adept astrologer.
